name: RBT Metal Forming
overview:
Established in the year 2010, we, “RBT Metal Forming (Pvt.) Limited”, is an ISO 9001:2008 engaged in manufacturing and supplying a vast array of Kitchen Interior Design, Kitchen Chimney, Kitchen Basket, Kitchen Door & Shutter and Kitchen Pullout Drawer.

Our Infrastructure: A state-of-the-art infrastructure facility is established by us for executing the business process in a streamlined manner. Spread over a vast area, this facility is equipped with all the requisite machines and advanced technology that help us in utilizing the resources in a judicious manner. The machines installed are regularly upgraded that enable us to maintain high production rate.

Our Quality: Being a quality oriented organization, we strive to maintain high quality standards in our products and policies. The products offered by us are manufactured using excellent quality material that is sourced from certified vendors after scouring the market. Advanced technology and latest machines are employed to manufacture the offered range following industry set guidelines.

Our Team: Engineers Quality controllers R & D experts Warehousing & packaging experts Sales and marketing executives

Client Satisfaction: Being a client centric organization, our main is to maximize the content level of our respectable clients in the best possible manner. For this reason, we make sure that superior quality products are offered to them at nominal prices.

Why Us? : Excellent quality product range Stringent quality policy Use of cutting edge technology Industry lading prices Skilled and qualified personnel Streamlined activities Expedite delivery
